lead_paragraph: Prime Minister Theresa May will write to European Council President Donald Tusk this month [L5N1GG31G] to trigger Britain's withdrawal from the European Union under Article 50 of the EU treaty.
snippet: Prime Minister Theresa May will write to European Council President Donald Tusk this month [L5N1GG31G] to trigger Britain's withdrawal from the European Union under Article 50 of the EU treaty....
